tool.name: Quikr
tool.description: subset selection tool for metagenomics analysis

param.name: label
param.label: name of the colum of mapping file that indicates the labels

tool.help: Fizzy is s a subset selection tool that uses FEAST in the background to run feature selection. Fizzy processes BIOM and mapping files, which are a standard in metagenomics data analysis. fizzy will run feature selection on taxanomic abundances obtained from the biom file given a set of categorical labels obtained form the the mapping file.
